title: American Sociological Review - Who Controls Criminal Law? Racial Threat and the Adoption of State Sentencing Law, 1975 to 2012
itunes:title: American Sociological Review - Who Controls Criminal Law? Racial Threat and the Adoption of State Sentencing Law, 1975 to 2012
description: Author Scott Duxbury discusses his article, "Who Controls Criminal Law? Racial Threat and the Adoption of State Sentencing Law, 1975 to 2012," published in the February 2021 issue of American Sociological Review.
